description.en:
Composing the plan of practice, work in the practice base (4 weeks), composing the practice report (5-10 pages), defense of the practice report.

The practice report must contain:
1) an overview of the practice base,
2) the goals of the practice and the tasks given and solved during the practice,
3) the methods applied to solve the tasks and the description of the process,
4) conclusion about the results of the practice (what knowledge and skills were gained)

The practice base of Professional Practice II may differ from the base of Professional Practice I. If the practice parts I and II take place in the same institution, it is sufficient to compose one practice plan and practice report including both practices.
description.et:
Praktikaplaani koostamine, töö praktika baasis (4 nädalat), praktika aruande koostamine (5-10 lk), praktika aruande kaitsmine.

Praktika aruandes peab sisalduma:
1) lühiülevaade praktika baasist,
2) praktika eesmärk ja ülesanded,
3) ülesannete lahendamise meetodid ja käik,
4) kokkuvõte praktika tulemustest (milliseid teadmisi ja oskusi praktikant sai juurde).
 	
Erialase praktika II baas võib erineda erialase praktika I baasist. Kui praktika osad I ja II toimuvad samas asutuses teineteise järel, võib koostada ühtse praktikaplaani ning praktika aruande.

objectives.en:
The goals of Professional Practice II are:
1. to give students the first work experience in their specialty,
2. to fix the theoretical knowledge obtained during the studies,
3. to motivate students to obtain additional knowledge and skills,
4. to help finding a topic with practical value for the master thesis, and to find the required material.

Prior work experience can also be considered as passing Professional Practice II.
objectives.et:
1. anda edasine töökogemus oma erialal, 
2. kinnistada õpingute käigus kogutud teoreetilisi teadmisi, 
3. tekitada lisamotivatsiooni teadmiste ja oskuste täiendamiseks,
4. aidata kaasa praktilise väärtusega magistritöö teema leidmisele ja vastava materjali hankimisele.

Praktikana on võimalik arvestada ka varasemat erialast töökogemust.

learning_outcomes.en: Participants who pass Professional Practice II
1. have contact with real problems of the field,
learning_outcomes.et: 1. on kokku puutunud oma eriala reaalsete probleemidega,

learning_outcomes.en: 2. have experience of applying the theory to solve practical problems,
learning_outcomes.et: 2.  on saanud kogemuse teooria rakendamiseks praktikas,

learning_outcomes.en: 3. know at least one narrower field in their specialty in more detail,
learning_outcomes.et: 3. tunneb lähemalt ühte kitsamat töövaldkonda oma erialal,

learning_outcomes.en: 4. can more adequately estimate their knowledge and skills,
learning_outcomes.et: 4. oskab adekvaatsemalt hinnata oma teadmisi ja oskusi,

learning_outcomes.en: 5. have an experience in working in a collective and developed their social abilities,
learning_outcomes.et: 5. on saanud kogemuse tööks kollektiivis ja arendanud edasi oma suhtlemisvõimet,

learning_outcomes.en: 6. have (if possible) acquainted themselves with the problems of the master thesis

independent_work.et: Depending on individual practice plan. / Vastavalt individuaalsele praktikaplaanile.

description.en: To pass to defence, practice report (5-10 pages), practice plan and supervisor opinon need to be submitted.
description.et:
To pass to defence, practice report (5-10 pages), practice plan and supervisor's opinon need to be submitted. /
Arvestusele pääsemiseks tuleb esitada praktikaaruanne (maht 5-10 lk) koos praktikakoha poolse juhendaja arvamusega.

description.en: Defence of the practice report in front of the committee assigned by the head of the institute.
description.et:
Defence of the practice report in front of the committee assigned by the head of the institute. / 
Praktikaaruande kaitsmine MSI juhataja poolt määratud komisjoni ees. Komisjoni otsus.
